text: Roderick World Harris (born November 14, 1966 in Dallas, Texas) was an American football wide receiver in the National Football League for the New Orleans Saints, the Dallas Cowboys, and the Philadelphia Eagles. He also played seven seasons in the Canadian Football League. He played college football at Texas A&M; University. title: Rod Harris
